attributes.action: claim back the £2000 it as cost us to help the banks with a £2000 refund in 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is our understanding that the 50 Billion Pound hand out of tax payers money to help the banks through the credit crunch which is £2000 per tax payer so if you are going to take with one hand then its about time you gave back with the other and give every tax payer a £2000 refund in the tax year 2009/2010
